Name: Repeal of section 10-181 of such code relating to unlawful methods of restraint during an arrest or attempted arrest.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the repeal of section 10-181 of such code relating to unlawful methods of restraint during an arrest or attempted arrest
Summary: This bill would remove a prohibition on police officers from using a chokehold or compressing a person’s diaphragm while making or attempting to make an arrest. This bill would be retroactive to July 15, 2020.
Text:
Int. No. 2116

By Council Members Holden, Borelli, Ulrich and Matteo

..Title
A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the repeal of section 10-181 of such code relating to unlawful methods of restraint during an arrest or attempted arrest
..Body

Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
      
      
      Section 1. Section 10-181 of the administrative code of the city of New York is REPEALED.
      � 2. This local law takes effect immediately and is retroactive to, and deemed to have been in effect as of July 15, 2020.
